data.name: ZZ_KIngHoo_LookUpInventory
data.value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ZZ_KIngHoo_LookUpInventory] @FNumber NVARCHAR(80) AS BEGIN EXEC dbo.CheckInventory --declare @FQtyDecimal int --set @FQtyDecimal =
SELECT C.FName [仓库/单据],D.FName 仓位, STR(A.FQty,LEN(A.FQty),B.FQtyDecimal)+ E.FName 主计量, STR(A.FSecQty,LEN(A.FSecQty),B.FQtyDecimal) +F.FName 辅助计量,A.FBatchNo 批号 FROM ICInventory A JOIN dbo.t_ICItem B ON A.FItemID=B.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_Stock C ON A.FStockID=C.FItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_StockPlace D ON A.FStockPlaceID=D.FSPID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit E ON B.FUnitID=E.FItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit F ON B.FSecUnitID=F.FItemID WHERE B.FNumber = @FNumber and (FQty!=0 and FQty is not null) UNION --预计出库量 --预计出库 条件：任务单未完结 减去已下推的领料数量 SELECT '投料单 - ' + A.FBillNo [仓库/单据],'' 仓位, STR ((B.FQtyMust - B.FQty),LEN(B.FQtyMust - B.FQty),D.FQtyDecimal) + E.FName 主计量, '' 辅助计量,B.FBatchNo 批号 FROM dbo.PPBOM A JOIN dbo.PPBOMEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.ICMO C ON A.FICMOInterID=C.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem D ON B.FItemID = D.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit E ON B.FUnitID=E.FItemID WHERE C.FStatus!=3 AND D.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQtyMust - B.FQty)>0 UNION SELECT '销售订单 - ' + A.FBillNo [仓库/单据],'' 仓位, STR((B.FQty-B.FCommitQty),LEN(B.FQty-B.FCommitQty),C.FQtyDecimal) + D.FName 主计量, STR((B.FSecQty-B.FSecCommitQty),LEN(B.FSecQty-B.FSecCommitQty),C.FQtyDecimal) 辅助计量,B.FBatchNo 批号 FROM dbo.SEOrder A JOIN dbo.SEOrderEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem C ON B.FItemID=C.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit D ON B.FUnitID=D.FItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit E ON C.FSecUnitID=E.FItemID WHERE A.FClosed!=1 AND C.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQty-B.FCommitQty)>0 UNION --预计入库量 SELECT '采购订单 - ' + A.FBillNo [仓库/单据],'' 仓位, STR((B.FQty-B.FCommitQty),LEN(B.FQty-B.FCommitQty),C.FQtyDecimal) + D.FName 主计量, '' 辅助计量,'' 批号 FROM dbo.POOrder A JOIN dbo.POOrderEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem C ON B.FItemID=C.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit D ON B.FUnitID=D.FItemID WHERE A.FClosed!=1 AND B.FMrpClosed!=1 AND C.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQty-B.FCommitQty)>0 UNION --采购申请 SELECT '采购申请 - ' + A.FBillNo [仓库/单据],'' 仓位, STR((B.FQty-B.FCommitQty),LEN(B.FQty-B.FCommitQty),C.FQtyDecimal) + D.FName 主计量, STR((B.FSecQty-B.FSecCommitQty),LEN(B.FSecQty-B.FSecCommitQty),C.FQtyDecimal) 辅助计量,'' 批号 FROM dbo.PORequest A JOIN dbo.PORequestEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem C ON B.FItemID=C.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit D ON B.FUnitID=D.FItemID WHERE A.FClosed!=1 AND C.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQty-B.FCommitQty)>0 END

data.name: ZZ_KIngHoo_LookUpInventory_Summary
data.value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ZZ_KIngHoo_LookUpInventory_Summary] @FNumber NVARCHAR(80) AS BEGIN EXEC dbo.CheckInventory --declare @FQtyDecimal int --set @FQtyDecimal = SELECT '库存' 名称, isnull(SUM(isnull(A.FQty,0)),0) 主计量, isnull(SUM(isnull(A.FSecQty,0)),0) 辅助计量 into #Ret__ FROM ICInventory A JOIN dbo.t_ICItem B ON A.FItemID=B.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_Stock C ON A.FStockID=C.FItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_StockPlace D ON A.FStockPlaceID=D.FSPID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit E ON B.FUnitID=E.FItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit F ON B.FSecUnitID=F.FItemID WHERE B.FNumber = @FNumber and (FQty!=0 and FQty is not null) UNION --预计出库量 --预计出库 条件：任务单未完结 减去已下推的领料数量 SELECT '预计出库量' 名称, isnull(SUM (isnull(B.FQtyMust,0) - isnull(B.FQty,0)),0) 主计量, 0.0 辅助计量 FROM dbo.PPBOM A JOIN dbo.PPBOMEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.ICMO C ON A.FICMOInterID=C.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem D ON B.FItemID = D.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit E ON B.FUnitID=E.FItemID WHERE C.FStatus!=3 AND D.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQtyMust - B.FQty)>0 UNION SELECT '预计出库量' 名称, isnull(SUM(isnull(B.FQty,0)-isnull(B.FCommitQty,0)),0) 主计量, isnull(SUM(isnull(B.FSecQty,0)-isnull(B.FSecCommitQty,0)),0) 辅助计量 FROM dbo.SEOrder A JOIN dbo.SEOrderEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem C ON B.FItemID=C.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit D ON B.FUnitID=D.FItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit E ON C.FSecUnitID=E.FItemID WHERE A.FClosed!=1 AND C.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQty-B.FCommitQty)>0 UNION --预计入库量 SELECT '预计入库量' 名称, isnull(SUM(isnull(B.FQty,0)-isnull(B.FCommitQty,0)),0) 主计量, 0.0 辅助计量 FROM dbo.POOrder A JOIN dbo.POOrderEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem C ON B.FItemID=C.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit D ON B.FUnitID=D.FItemID WHERE A.FClosed!=1 AND B.FMrpClosed!=1 AND C.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQty-B.FCommitQty)>0 UNION --采购申请 SELECT '预计入库量' 名称, isnull(SUM(isnull(B.FQty,0)-isnull(B.FCommitQty,0)),0) 主计量, isnull(SUM(isnull(B.FSecQty,0)-isnull(B.FSecCommitQty,0)),0) 辅助计量 FROM dbo.PORequest A JOIN dbo.PORequestEntry B ON A.FInterID=B.FInterID JOIN dbo.t_ICItem C ON B.FItemID=C.FItemID JOIN dbo.t_MeasureUnit D ON B.FUnitID=D.FItemID WHERE A.FClosed!=1 AND C.FNumber=@FNumber and (B.FQty-B.FCommitQty)>0
--select * from #Ret__ select 名称,SUM(主计量) 主计量,SUM(辅助计量) 辅助计量 into #Ret___ from #Ret__ group by 名称 select 名称,STR(主计量,LEN(主计量),(select FQtyDecimal from t_ICItem where FNumber=@FNumber)) 主计量, STR(辅助计量,LEN(辅助计量),(select FQtyDecimal from t_ICItem where FNumber=@FNumber)) 辅助计量 , ISNULL((select FName from t_MeasureUnit where FItemID=(select FUnitID from t_ICItem where FNumber=@FNumber)),'') 主计量单位名称, ISNULL((select FName from t_MeasureUnit where FItemID=(select FSecUnitID from t_ICItem where FNumber=@FNumber)),'') 辅助计量单位名称 from #Ret___ where 主计量>0 END
